---
title: Zona Orbicularis (Anular Ligament)
---


The zona orbicularis is the lesser known "4th hip ligament" which is overshadowed by the Big 3 hip ligaments (ischiofemoral, iliofemoral, pubofemoral).


# Anatomy

The Zona orbicularis (anular ligament) is not visible in most anatomy diagrams since it "encircles the femoral neck like a button hole" @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020.
